price: 33. Mpe totiaki libota na libota bakitani kowuta na maye baboti batiki to mpe ba ndeko okati ya libota, kasi, mpona bato basusu baye bopesaki bango elaka, bopesa bango nkita eye bolakaki bango, ya sôló Allah azali nzeneneke likolo ya biloko binso.
arabic: وَلِكُلّٖ جَعَلۡنَا مَوَٰلِيَ مِمَّا تَرَكَ ٱلۡوَٰلِدَانِ وَٱلۡأَقۡرَبُونَۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ عَقَدَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُكُمۡ فَـَٔاتُوهُمۡ نَصِيبَهُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدًا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walikullin jaʿalnā mawāliya mimmā taraka al-wālidāni wal-aqrabūna wa-alladhīna ʿaqadat aymānukum faātūhum naṣībahum inna al-laha kāna ʿalā kulli shayin shahīdan
